title: Pool party Renekton's W does not have bubbles.
body: I was playing a custom game with pool party Renekton and i noticed that the bubbles from the W didn't appear. I ve seen before that there must be bubbles and i was hearing the voice, but there weren't any.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We'll take a look!

Loving seeing this pattern so beautifully displayed... all over the Bug Reports forums, game-breaking bugs and actual issues, not to mention all the big ones that have been hanging around ruining games for literally years, but no, Riot can only respond to the missing bubbles post...

*#*RiotFixYourGame

I'm not much help with a lot of those issues - I'm a part of the skins team, which is why you'll usually see me commented on issues relating to skins. 

With that said, we do have people who check out the forums in other disciplines and look into many of the issues, although they may not comment on every bug report. :]

I do appreciate that you in particular are commenting on the area that you are involved in, but you need to have a serious discussion with your peers. I should also clarify that the problem isn't so much of the posting on the forums (though it is nice when Riot communicates, it doesn't fix bugs) it's that between the general lack of communication on bugs and the snail's pace at fixing them (not to mention the bugs that aren't fixed even when Riot tries) the QA/Bugfixing has sorely needed several notches of improvement for quite some time.

Hey! 

Super sorry for the long long wait. We've [finally] figured out what the issue was here, and this is something that should be resolved next patch!
